auth.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.displayNameTooLong: Display name must be at most 32 characters
auth.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already in use
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts, please try again later
auth.resetNotConfigured: Password reset is not configured on this server
